src:
Duga pauza za Karija
01 Nov 2019, 22:19 by Darko
Pred zvezdom Golden Stejta Stefom Karijom je duga pauza. On je u petak podvrgnut hirurškom zahvatu u Los Anđelesu zbog preloma leve ruke koji je doživeo na utakmici protiv Feniksa.
Prema prvim prognozama oporavak Stefa Karija će trajati najmanje tri meseca, objavio je Golden Stejt.
Voriorsi su loše počeli sezonu, pobedivši samo jednom u prve četiri utakmice, a dugo odsustvo Karija novi je udarac za klub koji je u poslednjih pet godina tri puta osvajao šampionski prsten (2015, 2017. i 2018.).

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Long break for Kari
01 Nov 2019, 21:19 by Darko
There is a long break ahead of Golden State star Steph Curry. He underwent surgery in Los Angeles on Friday for a left arm fracture he suffered at a game against Phoenix.
According to initial estimates, Steph Kari's recovery will take at least three months, Golden State reported.
The Warriors started the season poorly, winning only once in their first four games, and Kari's long absence is a new blow for the club, which has won the championship ring three times in the last five years (2015, 2017 and 2018).
